name: YU
shortDescription: A creative app encouraging young users to spend less time online and more time engaging in real life.
description: YU is a wellness-focused mobile app that gamifies screen-time reduction through mutual support. Our team began with user research to understand teen phone habits, then crafted a prototype in Figma backed by a playful and supportive UX. I contributed to both the UI/UX design and the front-end using React, along with API development and integration using Node.js. The whole experience was enriched with smooth CSS animations and responsive design. You can view the Figma design or check out the GitHub repository for the Front-end and Back-end.

name: Evergreen
shortDescription: A gamified platform for the Eco-Escolas program, helping students engage in educational activities.
description: Evergreen is a digital platform designed to enhance the Eco-Escolas educational experience for students of all ages. Developed over a school year, it helps students organize activities and stay engaged through an intuitive, gamified interface. Explore the Figma design or check out the GitHub repository for the Front-end and Back-end.

name: Anda
shortDescription: A redesigned transit app for Metro do Porto to improve commuter experience.
description: Anda is an app designed for Metro do Porto that replaces the traditional transit card with a digital solution. Explore the Figma design.

name: Cinema Trindade
shortDescription: A UX/UI redesign project for Cinema Trindade, improving usability and design.
description: Given the task of improving the user experience of a platform, we redesigned the interface for Cinema Trindade. Explore the Figma design.

name: MF Makeup Artist
shortDescription: A personal website to promote services and book appointments.
description: I designed and developed this site solo to showcase the brand of a local makeup artist. Starting with a style guide and logo design in Illustrator, I translated the visual identity into a responsive Vue site with CSS styling and form handling. Explore the Figma design or check out the GitHub repository for the Front-end.

name: Eco-Meow
shortDescription: A fun educational game that teaches players about proper waste sorting and recycling.
description: Eco-Meow is an engaging educational game focused on waste sorting and recycling. Designed to be both fun and informative, it leverages interactive mechanics to make learning easy. You can explore the assets we used from the game Sprout Valley, before it was out, and check out the code on GitHub.

name: Eco-Meow 2.0
shortDescription: An enhanced 3D version of Eco-Meow with cooperative gameplay and environmental themes.
description: Eco-Meow 2.0 builds on the original Eco-Meow with different graphics and new cooperative gameplay elements. You can explore the code on GitHub.

name: Sumol
shortDescription: A redesign of Sumol's landing page and email marketing strategy.
description: This was a marketing-focused project. We analyzed Sumol’s brand and created a more dynamic landing page using bold visual elements and bright colors in Figma. We also designed a set of email templates. Explore the Figma design.

name: Training Wheels
shortDescription: A video platform to make learning traffic regulations engaging and interactive.
description: Training Wheels was my first major college project, where we developed a Figma prototype and built the platform on GitHub.
